name: Demonic Conversion
desc: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Enigma himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.

name: Whirling Death
desc: Timbersaw whirls extremely sharp edges, damaging enemies and destroying trees around him in an area.  If an enemy hero is affected, it loses some of its primary attribute for a short duration.  Whirling Death will deal Pure damage if a tree is cut down in the process.

name: Darkness
desc: Night Stalker smothers the sun and summons instant darkness, so that he might use his powers at their fullest. While Darkness is in effect, enemy heroes, units and wards have their vision range reduced.  Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Ancient Seal
desc: Skywrath Mage seals the targeted unit with an ancient rune, silencing it and causing it to take additional damage from spells.

name: Sand Storm
desc: CHANNELED - Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision.  The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.

name: Terrorize
desc: Dark Willow releases her pet wisp to terrorize her enemies. After a short delay, all enemies in the target area become fearful and run toward their home fountain. Terrorize cannot be used while Bedlam is active.

name: Malefice
desc: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2 seconds.

name: Time Dilation
desc: Faceless Void traps all nearby enemies in a time dilation field for 6/8/10/12 seconds, freezing their cooldowns and slowing their movement and attack speed by 14% for each cooldown frozen.

name: Borrowed Time
desc: When activated, all damage dealt to you will heal instead of harm. Most negative buffs will also be removed. If the ability is not on cooldown, it will automatically activate if your health falls below 400. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter. DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

name: Dispersion
desc: Damage done to Spectre is reflected on her enemies, leaving her unharmed. The effect lessens with distance.
